artist: Artist: Yamamura Kōka (Toyonari); Publisher: Yamamura Kōka Hanga Kankōkai
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of man in profile from PL side; blue and white kimono with orange collar
markings: date seal: 大九 (Tai ku) | LLC: red artist\'s seal: 山森 (Yamamori)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: From Untitled actor series, sometimes called Flowers of the Theatrical World (Rien no hana 梨園の華)
text: First design in a set of twelve. Based on Nakamura Ganjirō I (1860-1935) as Akaneya Hanshichi in the play Akane-zome, あかね染, performed at the Shin-Tomi Theater, February 1917.
title: Actor Nakamura Ganjirō I as Akaneya Hanshichi
